revised_title: Hortulan and Rural Advertisements: Cider-Mills, Floating-Mills, and Household Gardens
tldr: The author discusses various methods of cider production, including the use of cider mills and household gardens, as well as the potential benefits of floating mills for grinding corn on rivers. He also highlights the advantages of using cider as a healthy and cost-effective alternative to beer and wine, and the importance of household gardens for providing food and medicine.
